questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: The cloud service model you choose does not determine the variety of security features, compliance auditing, and other requirements
questionOption2: To determine the particular security mechanisms you need, you must perform a mapping of the particular cloud service model to the particular application you are deploying
questionOption3: A security control model includes the security that you normally use for your applications only
questionExplanation: These mechanisms must be supported by the various controls that are provided by your service provider, your organization, or a third party.

questionTitle: Azure Storage plays the same role in Azure that ______ plays in Amazon Web Services.
questionExplanation: For relational database services, SQL Azure may be used.

questionTitle: Which of the following aims to deploy methods for measuring various aspects of cloud performance in a standard way?
questionExplanation: SMI stands for Service Measurement Index.

questionTitle: Which of the following is photo-editing and management software?
questionExplanation: Organize and edit your photos using Picasa.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: A service in SOMF that is granular and very narrow in scope is referred to as an atomic service
questionOption2: An atomic service can be decomposed into smaller services that provide a useful function
questionOption3: SOA describes a distributed collection of services performing business process functions
questionExplanation: A collection of composite services that would form a process module is referred to as a service cluster.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a compliance standard?
questionExplanation: A compliance standard can be any government regulatory framework.

questionTitle: ________ is surely an impediment to established businesses starting new enterprises.
questionExplanation: Capitalization may be the single largest reason that new businesses fail.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: A cloud is defined as the combination of the infrastructure of a datacenter with the ability to provision hardware and software
questionOption2: High touch applications are best done on-premises
questionOption3: The Google App Engine follows IaaS
questionExplanation: The Google App Engine follows PaaS.

questionTitle: Office Web Apps can be accessed through Windows Live ________ using a SharePoint Server.
questionExplanation: Skydrive can be a repository for your desktop office files or can serve as an online file share.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Cloud architecture can couple software running on virtualized hardware in multiple locations to provide an on-demand service
questionOption2: Cloud computing relies on a set of protocols needed to manage interprocess communications
questionOption3: Platforms are used to create more complex software
questionExplanation: The most commonly used services uses a set of discovery and description protocols based on WSDL.

questionTitle: Which of the following is Cloud Platform by Amazon?
questionExplanation: One of the most successful cloud-based businesses is Amazon Web Services, which is an Infrastructure as a Service offering that lets you rent virtual computers on Amazon’s own infrastructure.

questionTitle: _________ is used for merchant transactions under the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard.
questionExplanation: Organizations can manage PCI compliance risk more effectively with the help of ClearPoint PCI.

questionTitle: Which of the following flag is used by backup software to specify whether a file should be backed up or not?
questionExplanation: The bit is set on for backup and cleared when backup has copied the file.

questionTitle: Which of the following provides access for developers to charge Amazon’s customers for their purchases?
questionExplanation: FPS is a payments-transfer infrastructure.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Mashups are an incredibly useful hybrid Web application
questionOption2: SaaS will eventually replace all locally installed software
questionOption3: The establishment and proof of identity is a central network function
questionExplanation: An identity service is one that stores the information associated with a digital entity in a form that can be queried and managed for use in electronic transactions.

questionTitle: How many number of characters can be sent in a single message through SMS?
questionExplanation: The Short Message Service (SMS) is a text-notification service that has evolved into a primary communications protocol for near-real-time message passing.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Every third-party IM clients aim to allow their users to connect to the different major IM services
questionOption2: SIP stands for Secure Initiation Protocol
questionOption3: XMPP stands for Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol
questionExplanation: SIP stands for Session Initiation Protocol.

questionTitle: What is the role played by Web service in SOA?
questionExplanation: SOA requires a standard messaging protocol and a form of federated database system.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: Cloud Computing has two distinct sets of models
questionOption2: Amazon has built a worldwide network of datacenters to service its search engine
questionOption3: Azure enables .NET Framework applications to run over the Internet
questionExplanation: Google has built mega data centres for its search engine.

questionTitle: Which of the following operating system support operating system virtualization?
questionExplanation: This type of virtualization creates virtual servers at the operating system or kernel level.

questionTitle: Which of the following is provided by ownership dimension of Cloud Cube Model?
questionExplanation: P stands for Proprietary ownership.

questionTitle: Which of the following can be best be described as a digital media receiver?
questionExplanation: Google TV is a media center software platform that will appear in some HDTVs.

questionTitle: An application that provides for transaction overflow in a reservation system is an example of ____________
questionExplanation: Most systems built to perform cloud bursting have a simple underlying design.

questionTitle: Cloud computing doesn’t require that ________ and software be composable.
questionExplanation: It is a highly desirable characteristic from a developer or user’s standpoint.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: SHOUTcast is best known for its SHOUTcast Radio
questionOption2: SHOUTcast is a proprietary server solution for streaming media on the Internet
questionOption3: NPR started out providing RealAudio files for streaming and then added Windows Media files as a second format
questionExplanation: National Public Radio is a very good example of how audio streaming has evolved.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: To scale in, the service must allow for stored data to span additional storage systems
questionOption2: To scale up, the service must allow for more disks and more spindles to be provisioned
questionOption3: To increase the capacity of a storage provision, it is necessary to provide the capability to scale up or scale out across storage systems
questionExplanation: Cloud storage systems that successfully scale their provisioned storage for clients often allow for the multiple storage systems to be geographically dispersed and often provide load-balancing services across different storage instances.

questionTitle: ________ as a Service is a hosted application that is the cloud equivalent of a traditional desktop application.
questionExplanation: Most of the cloud computing compliance systems to date have been built using private clouds.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Management of cloud storage is performed by out-of-band management systems through a data storage interface
questionOption2: Out-of-band refers to a management console that isn’t on the storage network
questionOption3: Out-of-band is most often on an Ethernet network inside a browser
questionExplanation: From the management console, additional data services such as cloning, compression, de-duplication, and snapshots may be invoked.

questionTitle: Which of the following offers Storage size of 10GB free t0 100 GB paid?
questionExplanation: As unmanaged storage offerings progressed in sophistication, they began to offer value-added software services such as folder synchronization and backup.

questionTitle: Which of the following data type may be synchronized by SyncML?
questionExplanation: Different servers and clients allow for the synchronization of different data types.
